name: Donald G Gray
body:
### Welcome to the website for Donald G Gray.
Donald G Gray is an Open Source Developer specializing in database applications, music production, and computer aided drawing.

### SongBase music production application
SongBase is a database application for making music using JFugue MusicStrings.  

[website](http://songbase.gray10.com/)

### Glass Shutters drawing application
Glass Shutters is an application for creating DraftSight scripts for drawing glass shutters.  
[website](http://glassshutters.sourceforge.net/)

### Bagpipe Play Along
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Please contact info@gray10.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
